review: Works well. Did not have the private channels like Roku but does allow sideloading applications.
author: Ronald

review: Excellent product. Exactly as advertised. Easy set up out of the box. Could not be more satisfied.
author: Donald B. Gerland

review: Great product. Didn't like that I was automatically added and charged as a prime member.
author: Chenita Jarrett

review: The remote is a nice feature (vs Chromecast).I like the interface: convenient and intuitive.
author: Kevin Boglitz

review: Very nice but it losses connection with my WIFI router sometimes and I have to reboot it to get it to reconnect.
author: Marco Cantu

review: doesn't support cast from web. UI is clumsy... not worth...

review: Always buffering even when streaming at 105mps
author: CURTISHA

review: This device is great, still discovering more
author: Marie Supplice

review: This item sucks!  prefer it with an Ethernet connection.  The wireless streaming is unbearable.  I've had better success streaming wirelessly with a chromecast and a apple tv
author: Amazon Customer
